title: VEMO_MANAGER
author: VEMO_MANAGER
content: Lately we have seen a lot of online casinos that are considering themselves as Web3.0 but in reality it’s just a name, they don’t over a real Decentralized experience for players.So i want to know from you what’s are all the features an online casino should have to be considered as web3.0 casino?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Web3 casinos operate on web3 technology in a way that punters connect their noncustodial wallet to a gambling site in a way that payments are settled on blockchain, unlike the deposit and withdraw on centralized casinos.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: VEMO_MANAGER on April 25, 2023, 11:14:32 AMLately we have seen a lot of online casinos that are considering themselves as Web3.0 but in reality it’s just a name, they don’t over a real Decentralized experience for players.So i want to know from you what’s are all the features an online casino should have to be considered as web3.0 casino?Web3.0 is just another hype word. It is not really going to change anything because I think it is not going to deliver its promise which is building a decentralized internet.  If they somehow manage to bring it to life, maybe we will see casinos that operate on decentralized hosting & domains but it sounds a bit too unrealistic to me. First of all, a hosting firm needs a very good broad internet line, how are they gonna get it without collaborating with the government?I dunno... web3.0 sounds like a scam to me at this point.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Quote from: VEMO_MANAGER on April 25, 2023, 11:14:32 AMLately we have seen a lot of online casinos that are considering themselves as Web3.0 but in reality it’s just a name, they don’t over a real Decentralized experience for players.So i want to know from you what’s are all the features an online casino should have to be considered as web3.0 casino?In my opinion, it is the same as other crypto casinos because when regulations from the government have been fully implemented for all casinos, the word decentralized will no longer be used because there is already government intervention in supervising every online casino.But if it's a feature, maybe it's something we already know where we don't need to register using email but we can register or connect our personal wallet to the site and start playing right away. And we also don't need to verify our accounts, let alone do KYC, which many crypto gamblers don't want.

comments.author: HashBet.com
comments.body: A web3 casino must include the most important feature of player's maintaining custody of their bankroll. Meaning, the web3 casino has to connect to a player's wallet rather than settling deposits and withdraws. All bets have to be settled instantly. This provides some challenges for Web3 casinos because of a few reasons. Any blockchain that I consider secure enough to trust writing casino game smart contracts on also have scalability issues. There are some very promising ways to get around this by implementing layer two solutions but that is still in the early phases. The goal is to make Web3 gaming as seamless and user friendly as a traditional online gambling experience with the extra benefits, fairness and security of decentralization, imo.

Many so-called web3 casino is not really using even the part that they doesn't required user to deposit on their designated address but there are some web3 casino that use the proper web3 that use smart contracts on each bet so that user can play using their wallet.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I would consider a casino to be actually 3.0 web if people were able to gamble and partake in any kind of event and bonuses only through the use of their personal public cryptographic keys. No KYC and provably fair would be mandatory.However, I can understand some centralized casinos wanted to take advantage of the fever people had for Web 3.0 so they decided to use it as a marketing token and add some elements one could find on web 3 but without being fully decentralized. I still can appreciate a good casino even if they are not decentralized, I just would like them not to trick people and do not claim to be something they are not.
